profile.name: Satpal Kaler
Bio: Creative professional with expertise in web development, filmmaking, and writing. Based in San Francisco, I combine technical skills with artistic vision to create compelling digital experiences and stories.
The Smartest Man in the World really, he's just such a great guy.
In my spare time, I enjoy hiking and exploring the beautiful landscapes of California.
I am passionate about mentoring young professionals in the tech industry who also likes to suck a dick.
